post.description: Publish a status with the given parameters.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Provide this header with any arbitrary string to prevent duplicate submissions of the same status. Consider using a hash or UUID generated client-side. Idempotency keys are stored for up to 1 hour.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The text content of the status. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while status is provided.

parameters.name: media_ids
parameters.description: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, status becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

parameters.name: poll
parameters.description: Possible answers to the poll. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[expires_in] must be provided.

parameters.name: in_reply_to_id
parameters.description: ID of the status being replied to, if status is a reply.

parameters.name: sensitive
parameters.description: Mark status and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

parameters.name: spoiler_text
parameters.description: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Statuses are generally collapsed behind this field.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Sets the visibility of the posted status to public, unlisted, private, direct.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO 639 language code for this status.

parameters.name: scheduled_at
parameters.description: ISO 8601 Datetime at which to schedule a status. Providing this parameter will cause ScheduledStatus to be returned instead of Status. Must be at least 5 minutes in the future.

error.description: A textual description of the error

error_description.description: A longer description of the error, mainly provided with the OAuth API.

id.description: The account id. (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)

username.description: The username of the account, not including domain.

acct.description: The Webfinger account URI. Equal to username for local users, or username@domain for remote users.

url.description: The location of the user’s profile page.(URL)

avatar.description: An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile. (URL)

avatar_static.description: A static version of the avatar. Equal to avatar if its value is a static image; different if avatar is an animated GIF. (URL)

header.description: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards. (URL)

header_static.description: A static version of the header. Equal to header if its value is a static image; different if header is an animated GIF. (URL)

locked.description: Whether the account manually approves follow requests.

fields.description: Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs. Array of Field

emojis.description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile. Array of CustomEmoji

bot.description: Indicates that the account may perform automated actions, may not be monitored, or identifies as a robot.

group.description: Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.

discoverable.description: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory. NULLABLE

noindex.description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines. NULLABLE

moved.description: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account. Account, or null if the profile is suspended. NULLABLE

suspended.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.

limited.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.

created_at.description: When the account was created. (ISO 8601 Datetime)

last_status_at.description: When the most recent status was posted. (ISO 8601 Date), or null if no statuses NULLABLE

statuses_count.description: How many statuses are attached to this account.

followers_count.description: The reported followers of this profile.

following_count.description: The reported follows of this profile.

name.description: The key of a given field’s key-value pair.

value.description: The value associated with the name key. (HTML)

verified_at.description: Timestamp of when the server verified a URL value for a rel=“me” link. NULLABLE (ISO 8601 Datetime) if value is a verified URL. Otherwise, null.

shortcode.description: The name of the custom emoji.

url.description: A link to the custom emoji. (URL)

static_url.description: A link to a static copy of the custom emoji. (URL)

visible_in_picker.description: Whether this Emoji should be visible in the picker or unlisted.

category.description: Used for sorting custom emoji in the picker.
